ValidationRule.description: Prevents updating sales stage beyond "Discovery" unless certain conditions are met, but allows for Price Book wizard to bypass the rule.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName__c, "Proposal"), ISPICKVAL( StageName__c, "Review/Negotiation"), ISPICKVAL( StageName__c, "Contracting"), ISPICKVAL( StageName__c, "Closed Won")), Product_Count__c = 0, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Source__c, "TD")), Bypass_Product_Requirement__c = FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot move the Stage beyond Discovery without adding Programs first. To add Programs, please click Cancel and head to the Programs tab. If you believe this is in error, please contact your System Administrator.
